# preferredConfiguration

**Instance Property**

The map configuration style to use for snapshots.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var preferredConfiguration: MKMapConfiguration { get set }
```

## Discussion

Set this property to one of the [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKMapConfiguration] subclasses to configure the map style to use when making map snapshots.

## Configuring the map data

- **mapType**: The map’s visual style.
- **showsBuildings**: A Boolean that indicates whether the map displays extruded building information.
- **pointOfInterestFilter**: The filter to use for determining the points of interest that appear in the snapshot.
- **showsPointsOfInterest**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the map displays point-of-interest information.
